lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic retired during his quarterfinal in the Dubai Tennis Championships with an infection in both eyes on Thursday, ending his global run of 17 consecutive final appearances.
snippet: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic retired during his quarterfinal in the Dubai Tennis Championships with an infection in both eyes on Thursday, ending his global run of 17 consecutive final appearances....

headline.main: Djokovic Retires in Dubai Quarterfinals With Infected Eyes
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Retires in Dubai Quarterfinals With Infected Eyes
